head.title: Westmoreland County Public Schools - Welcome to Westmoreland County Public Schools

meta.content: Welcome to Westmoreland County Public Schools

div.span: 141 Opal Lane Montross, VA 22520 Phone: (804) 493-8018 Fax: (804) 493-9323

span.font: ​4/20/20 - Virtual School Board Meeting on Facebook Live at 6 PM

strong.font: 4/30/20 - Pre-K and Kindergarten Registration, 12 to 6 PM, By Appointment Only

img.alt: March Feeding info during closed schools

span.font: Westmoreland County Public Schools will open prior to Labor Day for the 2020-2021 school year. The first day for students will be August 10, 2020. This early start date will allow students to complete the entire first semester, including state assessments and final exams, prior to the Winter Break.
